title: How to Draw Tom from Tom and Jerry

steps.title: Draw the basic shapes for the whole body.
steps.content: Draw the basic shapes for the whole body. These will serve as your guide for the whole tutorial process.

steps.title: Refine the shape of his head, including the fur and his ears.
steps.content: Refine the shape of his head, including the fur and his ears.

steps.title: Now create curve lines for the eyes.
steps.content: Now create curve lines for the eyes.

steps.title: Then another arm on the left and leave some gap lines for the object that he is holding.
steps.content: Then another arm on the left and leave some gap lines for the object that he is holding.

steps.title: Then followed by his two legs and feet.
steps.content: Then followed by his two legs and feet.

steps.title: Add more details to the character.
steps.content: Add more details to the character.

steps.title: All lines and details are done.
steps.content: All lines and details are done. Now erase the guides that you have created before.
